title: How to Connect a USB Controller to a Switch

steps.title: Plug in your Switch dock to your TV.
steps.content: Plug in your Switch dock to your TV. Unfortunately, there is not a place for you to connect the USB controller to the Switch directly, so you'll need to use the dock and your TV. [1] X Research source The dock connects to the TV via an HDMI cable that came with the Switch, choose an HDMI input on your TV.

steps.title: Place your Switch inside the dock and turn on your TV.
steps.content: Place your Switch inside the dock and turn on your TV. The dock should be connected to the TV at this step so your Switch's screen is visible on the TV screen.

steps.title: Plug a USB cable into your controller.
steps.content: Plug a USB cable into your controller. You'll see the port for the USB cable on the top of the controller. The USB cable should have come with the controller; if not, you can purchase one from any retailer, like Amazon or Walmart.

steps.title: Insert the other end of the USB cable into your dock.
steps.content: Insert the other end of the USB cable into your dock. There are 2 USB ports on the left side of the dock (above the LED light) and one on the back. [2] X Research source Once the cable is connected, you should be able to use your Switch with your controller.
